title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for identifying the profit-maximizing output, Q2, and explaining that MC=MR at Q2.

  • One point is earned for identifying P5 on the demand curve above MC = MR.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/2 point(s)

2 points:

  • One point is earned for identifying the profit-maximizing output, Q2, and explaining that MC=MR at Q2.

  • One point is earned for identifying P5 on the demand curve above MC = MR.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for identifying the revenue-maximizing output, Q3, and explaining that since MR is zero at Q3, TR is at the maximum.

  • One point is earned for identifying P3 as the price corresponding to Q3.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/2 point(s)

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for identifying the price the government would require, P1, and the allocatively efficient output, Q4.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
3 points:

  • One point is earned for stating that the firm would incur a loss.

  • One point is earned for the explanation that ATC is greater than the price, P1.

  • One point is earned for identifying the area of loss, P1P2eg.
